00084 inline void Quad2::boundary(const Boundary & boundary) {
00085 
00086     delete boundary_;
00087     boundary_ = boundary.clone();
00088 }

00090 inline Boundary * Quad2::defaultBoundary(){
00091     
00092     RealVector min(2);
00093     
00094     min.component(0)=-0.5;
00095     min.component(1)=-0.5;
00096     
00097     RealVector max(2);
00098     
00099     max.component(0)=0.5;
00100     max.component(1)=0.5;
00101     
00102     return  new RectBoundary(min, max);
00103     
00104 }
